from django.contrib.auth.forms import AuthenticationForm

[docs]class DJMallAuthenticationForm(AuthenticationForm):
    captcha = CaptchaField(widget=DJMallCaptchaTextInput(attrs={'placeholder': '请输入验证码'}))
